name: exchange-a-gram
description: Share your photos with your friends on the line, but instantaneously

scripts.minify: uglifyjs public/src/js/app.js -o public/src/js/app.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/constants.js -o public/src/js/constants.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/feed.js -o public/src/js/feed.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/fetch.js -o public/src/js/fetch.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/idb.js -o public/src/js/idb.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/promise.js -o public/src/js/promise.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/utility.js -o public/src/js/utility.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run inject-sw

author: Zak Warren
